maqras.text: perfecit ego non covenant vos O Infans Adam ut vos non worship devil Ut he est tuus ardent enemy
Ac ut vos worship Me alone Hoc est rectus path
He misled multitudes de vos. Vos non possess any understanding
Hoc est Hell promised vos
Hodie vos burn it consequence tuus disbelief
Feria nos sigillum their mouths their manus feet bear testis everything they perfecit
Nos testimentum nos veil their eyes consequently when they seek path they non vide
Nos testimentum nos freeze them in locus; ergo they potuit nec move forward nor iit
Whomever nos permit vivens pro ut long temporis, nos revert eum to marasmus! they non understand
quod nos taught eum (messenger) non est poetry nor est he (poet)! Hoc est formidable proof profound Quran
To preach to those est alive expose disbelievers
they non vide nos habuit created them noster suus manus livestock they suus
Ac nos subdued them them; some they ride some they eat
They derive alius benefits ex them alias prout drinks they non est appreciative
They set DEUS alius deus perhaps they est de help to them
On the contrary they non help them; they finis serving them prout devoted militis
Ergo non saddened their utterances! Nos est fully aware de everything they conceal everything they declare
human est non vide nos perfecit created eum ex tiny drop tunc he turns into ardent enemy
He levabat question nos - dum forgetting his initial creation - Qui resurrect bones post they rotted
Dictus Unus initiated them in the 1 locus resurrect them! He est fully aware de omnis creation
He est Unus creates vos green trees fuel quae vos burn pro light
Non est Unus created caelum terra able to recreate the same sic indeed; He est Creator Omniscient
totus He perfecit carry any command est dictus to Est it est
Ergo glory est 1 in whose manus est sovereignty totus things Eum vos returned
arrangers columns
blamers de those to blamed
reciters messages
Tuus deus est unus
Dominus de caelum terra everything them Dominus de easts
Nos adorned inferior caelum adorning planets
Nos custos it omnis malus devil
They non spy High Society; they get bombarded omnis side
They condemned they incurred eternal retribution
any de them ventures charge outer limits he struck fierce projectile
Ask them Est they difficult create alius creations? Nos created them ex wet mud
dum vos awed they mock
When reminded they non take heed
When they vide proof they ridicule it
They dictus Hoc est obviously magic
Post nos abiit become dust bones nos resurrected
Et noster ancient patres
Dictus Sic vos forcibly summoned
Totus takes est 1 nudge whereupon they stand looking
They dictus Woe nos; hoc est Feria Judgment
Hoc est feria decision vos used disbelieve in
